title: Bear Attacks Destroyed This Libertarian Utopia | Matthew Hongoltz-Hetling Interview
description: In this episode of The Babylon Bee Podcast, Kyle and Ethan talk to Matthew Hongoltz-Hetling, author of A Libertarian Walks Into A Bear, a book about what happened when libertarians took over a small town in New Hampshire with the one goal of dismantling its government and then the bears arrived. Matthew is an award-winning author, longform writer and investigative international journalist based in New England and his work has been featured in the Associated Press and USA Today.

title: Matthew Hongoltz-Hetling on The Babylon Bee Podcast | Preview
description: 🎙 Tomorrow on The Babylon Bee podcast, Kyle and Ethan are joined by Matthew Hongoltz-Hetling, author of “A Libertarian Walks Into a Bear: The Utopian Plot to Liberate an American Town."
